modName: THE SKYRIM DREAM ENHANCER - The Picture Book Effect by FIFI
summary:
THE DREAM ENHANCER - The Picture Book Effect by FIFI
Changed your Post Process GFX Layer with an fantastic bloomed blured colored picture book effect. ONLY for Dreamer :) and IDEAL for low end PC´s^^
descriptionHtml:
THE GREAT PICTURE BOOK EFFECT Enhancer for Skyrim :)

Description:

This is a beautiful PICTURE BOOK POST EFFECT Enhancer. Its like a Dream when you play that game, the settings will create a bloomed blured fx depth color visual FX (bloom and blur -> iam a fan of these since i  fallen in love with a girl, hehe, you know what i mean ?!?!? ;). I´m sorry for guys how looking for Sharpening, but with my FX Settings i can truly say \"It was a great time in Skyrim\" or was it a Dream ?!?!? :) hehe

Its sometimes very bloomed so you can change the enbseries.ini and enbseries2.ini (yes there are two :) for your own just look in the bloom section !!!

I can also advice you to install the HD Texture Mods and the Plants and Environment Texture Mods :) to make it more realistic but even with the dream effect.

TIP: Its also great for low end PC´s, thanks for the comment :)

Installation:

Just extract these files to your skyrim main folder :) Start your Skyrim Launcher and be sure that your GFX adaption is set to \"Skyrim Enhanced Shader HDR\" and FXAA is enabled (find it in your Skyrim Launcher -> Advanced... :)) 

Activation:

To ENABLE the FX just press ones in GAME \"Shift - F12\" nothing else...
The last thing is to lower the Brightness setting in your INGame Options ! My setting is \"3 of 10\" (the default game setting is \"5 of 10\") to give it more True Depth Color ! 

Have a nice dream ähhh i mean time in Skyrim :)

So, dont let the screenshots be your first imagine, better is played and test it by yourself, well the lights will playing with your mind and changed with every move :)

OPTIONAL FILE:

I have uploaded a 2nd editon it contains the DREAM FX plus true COLOR and NON BLOOM when you press \"SHIFT 12\" ingame  IF YOU WANT 50percent BLOOM ADDITIONAL just press \"Shift F10\" be sure that \"Shift F12\" is active befor press \"Shift F10\" to see the Effect :)

Very BIG thanks goes to the authors for creating the...

\"SKYRIM ENHANCED SHADER\"
and
\"ENBSERIES\" by \"Boris Vorontsov\" he also coded the blur FX file where my settings are based on :)
and of curse the great looking \"SUNGLARE\" MoD.

AND ALL ARTIST OF THE ELDER SCROLLS SERIES :) Thanks a lot :)

P: Next Version i try to correct the balance of blur and sharpening, for bigger dreams, keep watching !!! Im sorry for my terrible english iam just a berliner boy^^ and i thanks for any comments well together we create a better mod of this :)

Thanks PCGAMES and BUFFED for more public of my MOD :)
author: FIFI
